commits.subject: atomic publish - PR only stores pending bumps, publish applies changes after merge
commits.raw: feat: atomic publish - PR only stores pending bumps, publish applies changes after merge
files: - PR mode: only commits .bump-pending.json (no package.json changes)
- Publish mode: reads .bump-pending.json, applies changes, publishes, commits
- If publish fails, package.json stays unchanged
This ensures publish failures don't leave package.json in an unpublished state.
